articles.title: 14 Corporate Innovation Lab Products That Changed The World
articles.description: Today, it seems like every large corporation has its own “innovation lab.” Designed to be nimble, startup-like working environments inside big corporations, these labs have produced some successes. They have also, like startups, produced a lot of failures. Fe…
articles.content:
Corporate innovation labs are hugely popular among enterprise organizations looking to compete against more nimble startups. Though their record is spotty, they have also created world changing products.
